sentence.text: Overexpression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and negative regulation of endopeptidase activity was observed in clinical specimens of lung cancer and fibrotic lesions.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Downregulation of miR-29a caused overexpression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and negative regulation of endopeptidase activity in lung cancer and IPF, suggesting that these genes are involved in the pathogenesis of these two diseases

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
